member.name: T:TracyWrapper.Profiler
member.summary: Application's profiler. Use this to interact with Tracy

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.InitThread(System.String)
member.summary: Call this once per thread before starting the profiler.
member.param: Set this for a custom thread display name.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.SetThreadName(System.String)
member.summary: Inform tracy of custom thread name

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.SetEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.param: Set to true to enable profiler.
member.exception: Cannot disable profiler while profiling scopes are pushed.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.HeartBeat(System.String)
member.summary: This needs to be called once every frame.
member.param: Display name

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.HeartBeatStart(System.String)
member.summary: Call to signal the start of a specific frame
member.param: Display name

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.HeartBeatEnd(System.String)
member.summary: Call to signal the end of a specific frame
member.param: Display name

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.PushProfileZone(System.String,System.UInt32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Display name
Display color
Override line number. Recommended to leave blank for caller's line number.
Override function name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's function name.
Override source file name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's source file name.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.Profiler.PushProfileZone(System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Display name
Display color
Override line number. Recommended to leave blank for caller's line number.
Override function name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's function name.
Override source file name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's source file name.

member.name: T:TracyWrapper.ProfileScope
member.summary: Object which can profile a scope automatically. Use inside a "using" statement.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.ProfileScope.#ctor(System.String,System.UInt32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Display name
Display color
Override line number. Recommended to leave blank for caller's line number.
Override function name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's function name.
Override source file name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's source file name.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.ProfileScope.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Display name
Display color
Override line number. Recommended to leave blank for caller's line number.
Override function name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's function name.
Override source file name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's source file name.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.ProfileScope.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Display name
Override line number. Recommended to leave blank for caller's line number.
Override function name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's function name.
Override source file name. Recommended to leave blank for caller's source file name.

member.name: M:TracyWrapper.ProfileScope.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose of the profile scope and end the timing.
